==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Chamboduc works at the [[Rag and Bone Shop]] and is a friend of [[Alvard]]. While Alvard is off restocking, he sometimes stands in for him and gets paid to watch the shop. Instead of paying in [[Mora]] or [[Credit Coupons]], Alvard lets Chamboduc take his pick of goods at the shop. Chamboduc also joined the shop as he heard that Alvard was a good friend of [[Wriothesley]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|An Opportunity for Rebirth}}</ref>
